backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles with access control and a lead submission system, allowing admins to view all hamper leads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping landing page features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the landing page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style configuration defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global border/background styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all landing page sections in order.
frontend/src/components/landing/ArtisanV: Section presenting brand artisan values using cards with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/landing/CuratedH: Section displaying curated hamper cards with images, descriptions, and a CTA that scrolls to customization.
frontend/src/components/landing/Customiz: Four-step visual explainer of the customization process using icon cards.
Form component that validates user inputs and submits custom hamper requests, showing a success message after submission.
frontend/src/components/landing/FAQSecti: Renders an accordion-based FAQ list describing processes, shipping, and policies.
frontend/src/components/landing/FinalCTA: Displays a final call-to-action section that logs clicks and scrolls users to the customization form.
frontend/src/components/landing/FooterSe: Footer with brand info, contact links, and dialogs for shipping and returns policies.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero banner with background image, trust badges, headline, and CTAs that trigger analytics and scrolling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Testimon: Shows a grid of customer testimonials with names, roles, ratings, and quotes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitHamperLead.t: Defines a mutation hook that submits a hamper lead via an actor and refreshes the leads query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, and theme variables for a warm artisan design with light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Contains placeholder analytics logging functions for CTA clicks and form submission events.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth scrolling helper to navigate to DOM sections with an offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, existing features, and image needs for the landing page project.
